STRICT AND STANDARD PURCHASING SERVICE

—————————————————————————————————————————

Direct Contact With Factories

We contact factories directly, negotiate with them with the aim to reduce your costs.

1

Evaluate Dimensions

Basic information, company scale, production abilities, after sales policy.

2

Export Documents

We use standard and authoritative procedures for customs clearance.

3

Strict Inspections

According to customer needs and industrial standards, we will perform 100% of the pre-shipment inspections.

4

360º RISK CONTROL

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Check Transaction Clauses

In order to avoid risks, we check each clause of the transaction carefully and give amendment suggestions accordingly.

Control Logistic Risks

Strict choice of a logistics service provider. From product packaging quality to shipping times, we help customers avoid risks at each logistics node.

On-Site Inspection

We go to factories to perform inspections before and after production, to make sure the transaction is safe.

Control Capital Risks

Bank accounts must be clearly stipulated on the contract, so the payment process can be traced.

TAILORED PROFESSIONAL SERVICE

————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Professional Category Operation Managers

Each category has several professional specialists, their experience can ensure customers will find the right products.

Multi-Language Service

With specialists from 7 countries, we provide an accurate and professional translation service to customers.
